name: MicroPets
description: MicroPets is a Binance Smart Chain token that capitalises on the current meme coin and NFT hype. We’ve taken everyone’s favorite memes and packaged them up into adorable pets you can trade or stake. The MicroPets team is comprised of over 30 Defi and marketing experts. The goal? To serve our community and investors, ensuring a fun and engaging environment alongside continuous marketing efforts.
